43697.name: Female share of employment in senior and middle management (%)
43697.description: The proportion of females in total employment in senior and middle management. It corresponds to major group 1 in both ISCO-08 and ISCO-88 minus category 14 in ISCO-08 (hospitality, retail and other services managers) and minus category 13 in ISCO-88 (general managers), since these comprise mainly managers of small enterprises.
43697.datasetName: World Bank Gender Statistics - Social Protection & Labor
43697.s_name: World Bank Gender Statistics: Female share of employment in senior and middle management (%)

source.name: World Bank Gender Statistics: Female share of employment in senior and middle management (%)
source.dataPublisherSource: International Labour Organization, ILOSTAT database. Data retrieved in March 2017.
